name: Qatar Q-Suite - Business Class as good as First?
description:
Since its launch in 2017 Qatar's Q Suite has set the standard in international business class.  But does it live us to its hype?  Is it still as good as it was?  Does it really match other airlines' First Class?

These questions will be answered as I revisit the Qatar Q Suite in this business class flight review.  

My flight onboard the Qatar A350 from Doha to Adelaide was 13 hours long so plenty of time to experience every luxury that the Qatar Airways Q-Suite has to offer.  

Join me and let's experience Qatar Airways Q Suite business class together.  

Here are the links I refer to in the video:

Channel Update - Getting through covid wearing 3 hats:  https://youtu.be/7KjoGvTiFqo
Qatar Q Suite - testing the Quad Seats:  https://youtu.be/9TvsoFCCGLY

Flight Details:

Route:    Doha (DOH) to Adelaide (ADL) 
Length:  7,044 miles,  12:47 hrs
Flight:     QR914
When:    10 Feb 2020
Aircraft:  Airbus A350-900   registration A7-AMJ - Apr 2019
Seat:       1A
Camera:  Panasonic HC-VX1 and GoPro 8 Black
